price: Na tukautia nguvu ufalme wake, na tukampa hikima, na kukata hukumu.
arabic: وَشَدَدۡنَا مُلۡكَهُۥ وَءَاتَيۡنَٰهُ ٱلۡحِكۡمَةَ وَفَصۡلَ ٱلۡخِطَابِ
footnotes: Tukautia nguvu ufalme wake, na tukampa Unabii na kupambanua baina ya Haki na baat'ili.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: washadadnā mul'kahu waātaynāhu al-ḥik'mata wafaṣla al-khiṭābi
